extensions.name: Example
extensions.description: An example extension demonstrating context menus, commands, notifications, dialogs, context API, built-in commands, configurable settings, progress reporting, and keybindings.
extensions.author: Aleksey Hoffman

extensions.name: Video Downloader
extensions.description: Download videos, playlists, audio, and streams from YouTube, Twitch, and thousands of other websites with quality and format options using the open-source tool yt-dlp.
extensions.author: Aleksey Hoffman
